articles.title: Poco X6 series launch is just a few weeks away: From specs to expected pricing, here is all we know so far - India Today
articles.description: Poco India has started to tease the Poco X6 series launch in India. While the official date isn't out, the Poco X6 and Poco X6 Pro are expected to launch in India in January 2024.
articles.content: January is going to be exciting for smartphone enthusiasts. There are a bunch of smartphone launches lined up for January 2024, including the launch of the Redmi Note 13 series and Vivo X100 series o… [+2891 chars]
